original_title: The Rise and Fall of an Olympic Village
overview: The Rise and Fall of an Olympic Village was Norway's contribution to the entertainmentfestival in Montreux in 1994. Represented by the commedytrio KLM (Trond Kirkvaag, Knut Lystad and Lars Mj√∏en). This short movie was directed by Helge Lyngstad.  The movie elaborates on how Norway secured the hosting of the Olympic in 1994 and the problems that unfolded.
title: The Rise and Fall of an Olympic Village
